title: NHM MP Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 06 Medical Office and Other Posts
description: The National Health Mission (NHM) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 06 Medical Officers and Nursing Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, B.Sc Nursing can grab this chance and apply for the NHM MP Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date...
